alert.note: Alert for Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 31 at 7:32PM CDT until June 01 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Wyandotte County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 145 AM CDT Thursday. * At 732 PM CDT, Emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Leavenworth, Lansing, Kansas City, Fairmount and Jarbalo. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
